ing: 2 Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored and diced
n: Bill and Annette's One Pot Kraut Special
des: "The surprising addition of peach tea tones down the kick of the kraut in this yummy twist on slow cooker sauerkraut!"
ins: Place apples and onion into a slow cooker. Set the pork loin on top, then add the sugar, sauerkraut, and iced tea. Cover and cook on High 6 to 8 hours until the pork is tender.
